mapper.update: update luntan set ltyl2=#{ltyl2} where ltid=#{ltid}
mapper.select: select * from (select a.*,rownum rn from (select * from luntan order by ltid) a where #{pageNo} >=rownum)b where rn>#{pageSize}
select rownum,a.* from (select * from luntan where ltstatus=1)a
